campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is my sixteenth Kickstarter project, and with each project, I could not have printed and produced them without our Kickstarter backers. This game is almost ready to be printed, but not without your support!.

There are many other challenges to making sure any Kickstarter project is successful. Because of occasional unforeseen events, it is common for board game production to be delayed. I've done all I can to ensure that this game will be delivered on time if funded. Of course, delays can happen, but the majority of my projects have been delivered early.

Another challenge is making sure that all the files and rules are correct when sent to the printer. I've done the graphic design and artwork for many games. My experience helps me ensure a smooth pre-production process.

With your help, we can have the funds to print the game, deal with any obstacles, and make sure you are delivered a quality product.

Tantrum House is diving into its 6th Season of board game media making and we need your support! Every day we publish at least one video to YouTube: Reviews, Kickstarter Previews, Playthrus, Board Games Launching on Kickstarter, and more.  Plus we host a weekly podcast with interviews and more! We've started a BRAND NEW series of LIVE videos that we're calling "Tantrum Talks" and it's a perfect place to interact with us as we discuss a number of topics related to the board gaming hobby.
To show our gratitude for your support we've got some amazing board game bundles, tons of promo cards, cool t-shirts, and our custom Quest Cards to offer as backer rewards so please scroll down and check them out!

campaign.story:
To those who have experienced smartphone conflicts in low lit public venues, we GET IT!
The current choice: Stay connected and annoy those around you OR stay disconnected and not annoy those around you.  Why can’t you stay connected and not annoy at the same time? REDtext gives you this freedom.  We believe you should be able to go to movies, plays, concerts, or other low lit public venues and stay connected WITHOUT disturbing others.
We need your help to get REDtext out to the world.
REDtext brings peace back to:
Parents with babysitters
Those on-call or first responders
Individuals with important work obligations
Parents with teens
Loved ones with unexpected situations

 Fun Video: Why REDtext is Needed 
PLAY


REDtext 

Gives confidence and ease back to those who love going out but need to stay connected.
The first text app specifically designed and real-life tested to WORK in theaters.  Using options like screen dimming, screen filter, night mode, and theater-mode apps are hard to read, difficult to use, and lead to embarrassing situations. (see the Science Behind REDtext at the bottom of this page)
 Our app removes all bright light from the phone's screen.  Some apps claim to be usable in low-lit public venues.  However, they all have elements of white brightness that come through the phone's screen. These apps are forgotten because they do not work.




 Printed Program Reading Light Detail  
 View plays, concerts, or other printed programs without disturbing others(see demo video below).
Adjustable brightness
Auto on when phone face down and auto off when phone face up.
Discrete pinpoint light for easy viewing.
Stop the white light given off from most other keyboard displays. The app itself and all the phone's notifications convert to a black background and red font in a single tap.
While the app is turned on, the user may freely view their phone without disturbing those around them. 
 (The person in the middle does not have REDtext installed.)
"No texting" until now. While we respect the cinematic experience and don't encourage this app to be used idly throughout a movie, sometimes you need to be able to check your messages.
Getting up and walking out of the theater can be just as distracting as turning on your phone, so we've created something we believe will both give you more freedom and create a less distracting environment for other moviegoers. Win-win.
Feel free to text late into the night without disturbing your partner or waking up your roommate. An excellent solution for couples, college roommates, and sleepovers that is not harmful to eyes.


Uses our carefully researched and patented technology. 
REDtext is more readable. First, the color red exhibits the least stress on your eyes of all colors in dark places. Second, dimming our screen to lower the white light or using filters makes the text harder to read resulting in the need to bring the screen closer to our eyes. In consequence, it has been shown to cause many people to report headaches or nausea. ( For more detail, see the Science behind REDtext at the bottom of this page.)

REDtext can be quickly customized to allow for one click activation for you to be ready to enjoy your movie, play, concert, or other performance in one click.

The red font brightness is adjustable to find the best readable viewing experience.
When photos are shared, the photos are displayed in a temporarily transformed state to not show disturbing white colors.
Emojis appear in red format.
When any app notification is received, it is presented in a red format view and the user can decide how to respond (to ignore, to add to a never show again list, or to reply. )
With phone calls, the default setting is in vibrate only mode and displays caller information and the user can decide how to respond (to answer, to ignore, or to text).



 Firefighters, police, emergency first-responders, and loving parents all need to stay connected when it matters. Feel the freedom of being able to go to your child's dance recitals, ballets, or plays without dealing with the anxiety that comes with the duty of being on-call.

 REDtext:  FEATURED ON FUNDED TODAY'S PODCAST! 






 Kevin Hancock and Ken Hancock (brothers)
The founders have college degrees and experience in math & science, project management and business management. As business owners for 20 years they have over 15 years of experience in software development and software team management.
PLAY

Our Story
This app idea originated when my wife and I (Ken) left our children with a babysitter to go on a well deserved date to our local movie theater. Before we left for the movies, we instructed our babysitter to text us if she needed anything.
My wife and I settled into our movie theater seats, the lights dimmed, and the movie started playing. Then my phone vibrated. I thought, "The babysitter is trying to reach me." Then again, maybe it was some random notification that I really didn't care about. What do I do now? I felt trapped. Do I turn my phone on, annoy everyone with the bright lights and become the center of attention? Do I ignore my phone and wonder throughout the movie if something has happened with my children. Do I get creative by putting my phone under the seat and bend over to read it (still annoying and embarrassing)? Or, I could stand and leave the theater, still causing a disturbance while others are trying to watch the screen.
Though it was difficult to read the notification, I opted to do the "phone under the seat" trick.
It turned out to be a sales notification, which I could care less about.
I was so frustrated that I had to go through those feelings of not knowing and embarrassment.
As I sat there with these thoughts, I just knew there had to be an app for this....why wouldn't there be an app for this? I'm sure I wasn't the only one that has gone through this experience. After that moment I undertook the task to locate an app for this glaring scenario.
I couldn't find one!
This is where the product idea started. I partnered with my brother, who knows software programming and light theory, and we started this journey of creating an app that would remove the stress of looking at your phone for important notifications while in a dark public venue.
We wanted to give people the freedom to communicate in dark venues without feeling trapped, anxious, or frustrated.
To stay connected when it matters.
We worked tirelessly and are very excited to be able to obtain a patent on this use of this new technology.

Science Behind REDtext  
 Why do we use the color red?
There are two reasons we use the color red. First, the color red in dark places exhibits the least stress on your eyes of all colors. In the dark, the eye pupils dilate or expand, letting in as much light as possible to see. In turn, certain colors cause more eye strain than others. This is because all colors of light emit pulses of photon energy each at different frequencies. The high-frequency colors like blue and violet produce more eye stress to a dilated pupil (see Scientific Reports). These colors have the smallest close-knit wavelengths in the spectrum of visible light. The shorter wavelengths cause higher strain on the eye and is, therefore, more sensitive and disruptive to others.
Moreover, there are some indications that prolonged reading in this environment can lead to future eye damage. Conversely, the color red has the lowest frequency in the spectrum of visible color. Namely, red has a longer more gentle wavelength with each pulse of energy and produces little to no eye stress. Consequently, red is not even seen or noticed by others seated around us.
Second, dimming our screen to lower the white light or using filters has been shown to cause many people to report headaches or nausea. This is because setting our phones this way reduces the level of contrast between the text we read and the background making the screen much harder to read. (See comparison diagram below) As a result, there is a need to move the phone closer to our eyes. This focusing on close objects in dark places causes higher stress on our eyes. There are internal eye muscles called the ciliary muscle which is located around the lens of your eye. These muscles need to contract to reshape the lens position so that the light coming in is redirected to a focal point at the back of the eye. The low contrast level of a dimmed or filtered screen causes increased and constant eyeball adjusting. (See Reading in the Dark Article ) As a result, this leads to much higher stress on these muscles.
  Patent granted in 2017

We're based in Gilbert, AZ, and we enjoy spending time with family and friends. We are co-owners of a successful small business in IT support which we have managed for 20 years. We believe that the power of using software thoughtfully can and should create freedom in the lives of individuals and communities. This will be our first Kickstarter venture. Through our experience in business, we believe that crowdfunding is the best way to bring REDtext to life. We purposefully have not sought for investors for this idea. Investors tend to want more control of the creative process, and we know that the customers are the ones that should be driving our products. Kickstarter is raw and direct. It connects creators with customers that share the same passion for the product. We want to listen to our backers and customer base so, in turn, REDtext becomes outstanding!

We've worked nonstop on this App for several years—there have been many hurdles, as you can imagine since Android and Apple did not design their smartphones to be used in dark public venues. We have overcome those obstacles one at a time, which included obtaining a patent for our unique technology.

At this point, much of the base functionality is in the app. This process has been slow due to limited resources. We need to increase our development resources to get this app completed quickly. Namely, the software team will be improving the user interface and working to verify compatibility with the many different smartphone manufacturers. Also, we will be building out a support system to make sure everyone has a useful and pleasant experience using REDtext on both Android and iOS.
 
Finally, because we want to deliver a premium product, we will be putting REDtext through a rigorous testing period to eliminate any bugs before we submit it to you and the app stores.

campaign.story:
'It was filmed using the Redcard'
A normal looking piggy bank and a doll…. is it really?
You can see the twinkling spy camera from one of the eyes of the piggy bank.

What is at the end of the familiar curtain and curtain rod?
Oh no! There is a twinkling lens found in the hole of the curtain rod!

What is that near the window?
Oh, there is a camera lens here too.



Hello everyone! My name is David Lee, the leader of this team
I'm a person who really loves traveling.
Traveling to different countries every year, meeting new people and experiencing new cultures is one of the most precious parts of my life.
But no matter where you travel, no matter what accommodation you go to, one can experience paranoia because of this possible threat…
That's the threat of spy cameras

With the universalization of global travel, traveling became very convenient, and with access to some available services, one has the option to stay in homes at relatively low prices instead of expensive hotels. 
But we've heard a lot of news about spy cameras that are found there.
There will be nothing more devastating than having a video somewhere on the internet which forever exposes my personal life, leaving me forever scarred all because of a journey I left for my happiness. 
So I made a teamed up with friends in the engineering and designer industry. 
I started brainstorming for solutions where one can quickly and easily get away from the threat of spy cameras. Meanwhile, we were hinted by a security expert with 26 years of experience on TV.
While the service for spy camera detectives are available on the market, if you search for portable infrared detectors they use, most of the devices are worth 300 dollars or more. Having these detectives come for a visit is just as expensive and adding this on top of ones travel expenses is definitely not budget friendly and is time consuming. 
Using a material called cellophane can be another solution but it is easily crumpled up, making it difficult to carry around. 
So we decided to make something more efficient and reasonable, and after a lot of research and effort, we made the Redcard. 
With this Redcard, anyone with a cellphone can easily detect the lens of the spy cameras. 


1. Let's make it strong!
A regular cellophane is not suitable because it is hard to cut and easily crumpled.
You can bend around all you want with our Redcard.

Cellophane is thinner than paper and can be easily wrinkled up. This makes it inadequate for frequent and long term use. One can use the coating method by pasting cellophane to a see through card but cellophane will start to scratch up and moisture will weaken it, making it impossible for semi- permanent use. 
Then a designer who has knowledge of diverse range of materials found a wonderful one. 
After testing, Redcard proved that it does not easily wrinkle up or rip because of its thicker attribute. Thickness made it very easy to cut it into the form we originally planned and there was no difference in the performance of the lens detection.



2. Let's make it portable!
It was very important that we made it easy to carry around anywhere. Size too small to cover lenses and flash was not compatible, and too large or too small to cover would reduce portability.
As a result, I thought that the most standardized size that I could carry around anywhere in my cell phone case, wallet, bag, etc. was 54mm x 86mm, the size of my credit card.
When I cut it to the size of a card, the edges were very sharp, leaving my hands with bloody cuts. So we rounded up the edges and left them to a professional to make it safe. 




3. All in one
It's really uncomfortable to carry a manual with you on your trip; therefore we thought it was important to provide a clear explanation. Please scan the QR code located on the bottom corner  for a clear instructional video to avoid any confusion.

How does it work?
PLAY

1) Cover both the camera and the flash with a Redcard. 
2) Turn on the flash and keep it on while pressing the video mode. 
3) Move the camera from various angles on suspicious areas for spy cameras. 
4) If you have a small shiny object, it can be a spy camera. 



4. You can save the next victim
And I thought again. it could be a way to protect me from illegal spy cameras, but how can I get one step closer to a world without illegal filming? 
It has to be cheap first. 
If its affordable, a lot of people can use Redcard and find more spy cameras. I thought this would reduce the number of illegal shooters, reduce the frequency of installation, and filming of spy cameras. So the world can be a little safer, right?
We need your help! I will do my best to make the Redcard affordable.


'Principle of the Redcard'
This is similar to the principle of infrared detectors. LED light, which is illuminated using Redcard and cell phone flash, have a wavelength of 600-700nm. The superimposed curved surface of the lens reflects the light of this wavelength back and is displayed in white dots on the mobile phone screen.


'Target amount and sponsorship plan'
Funds from Redcard will also be used as a cost to make the site for prevention of illegal filming and support for victims so that the Redcard will not end up just as a card. It will be used to open programs and projects to prevent illegal filming so that Redcard can spread and change the world. And If this project is successful, our next project will be a web webcam cover for $1.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Redcard’s precautions and weakness

1. It is a simple lens detector, not an all-purpose camera detector

It’s not an all-purpose spy camera detector but a simple one.
We believe that it's the easiest way to find a spy camera at a reasonable price.
The Redcard does not have the ability to track down frequencies like some expensive equipment and track where a spy camera is literally located. It's hard to find one with your naked eye, but if you use it the correct way, and flash it with the right angle, one will be able to find the spy camera. (Poke it with a pointed object, such as a hairpin or pen, to see what it is.

2. Writing can be erased

The description and design on the Redcard can’t be erased by hand, but can be easily erased by sharp objects or rough surfaces. This is because the material is smooth and does not have the ability to absorb ink on its own like paper. While the front can be coated to make it more wear-resistant, the coating will reduce transparency and reduce the performance of the product. We will continue our research to find out if there are better alternatives!

3. Do not over bend or fold the card 

Redcards are also flexible and recover their original condition quickly, but if one over bend the card to a certain point, the Redcards will not be able to recover its bent sides. We wanted to make this clear just in case someone may be unaware.

4. If you take a closer look, you'll find little scratches

The material itself is strong, and as it is stored and shipped from the factory, which can result in some scratches of its own. But it's almost invisible and will not have any impact on its efficiency. In some cases, however, please contact us to request an exchange if the scratches are very serious.

campaign.story:
End the struggle of carrying two bottles... Instead carry hot and cold liquids together in one with DUO! 
Get rid of the struggle of two bottles, take DUO with you anywhere, for all your favourite drinks combinations! 
THE LID  
NEAT & SIMPLE DESIGN
There are just 4 elements to the bottle (lid, straw and two bottles), making it easy to keep everything together. DUO not only ends the struggle of two bottles, but also has the ability to be split into two and used independently, if you so desire! 
BALANCE 
Having the inner and outer bottle sharing the same centre of gravity ensures greater stability. It allows for one bottle to be empty while the other is full and not cause the bottle to topple over.  
HIGHEST QUALITY MATERIALS
RECYCLED PLASTIC (rPET) 
The outer 1L bottle of DUO is made from rPET (recycled polyethylene terephthalate). This means we use recovered plastic (that would have otherwise reside in a landfill or worse, our oceans). We could have chosen to use virgin plastic, which is cheaper and far easier to source, but we believe we owe it to future generations to do everything within our means to preserve our planet. 
STAINLESS STEEL
The inner 350ml stainless steel bottle is double wall vacuum insulated meaning there is no transfer of heat from the hot liquids to the liquid in the outer bottle. It will keep your hot drinks hot and cold drinks cold. Stainless steel is also reusable and can be easily recycled.  
BPA FREE & LEAK PROOF
From the lid to the straw and to the outer and inner bottles, DUO is 100% BPA free and of course, totally leak proof!
ONE BOTTLE TO RULE THEM ALL!
We carefully considered the best features of bottles available and aimed to improve on them, when we designed what we believe to be the best possible drinking experience. Thats why we came up with the rotating straw nozzle for quick hydration and raised neck design to safely sip hot drinks.
We’re Sarah and Ed, and this is the story of how we came up with DUO. 
The idea was born from our own frustrations. With the plastic epidemic having become increasingly evident, we made the decision to live more sustainably. The starting point for us was to cut out single-use plastics in the form of water bottles and coffee cups, replacing these with reusable bottles. However, doing this wasn’t as easy as we first thought. Being big coffee drinkers, it was common for us to stop by the local cafe en-route to work for our morning coffee fix. This meant, to follow our sustainable living mission, we would need to start carrying a second bottle for our coffee, alongside the bottle we already had for water to keep us healthy and hydrated. We soon found that having two bottles was bulky and required a large amount of space in our bags; it was just inconvenient. 
We needed an easy solution that would help us carry our coffee and water in a space saving, easy and convenient way. After hours of searching we found such an invention did not exist, so we decided to create our own!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Sometimes unintended things happen which can cause delays and so in an effort to be totally open and honest, we have listed below what we believe to be the key risks in bringing your DUO to you within the timeline. 

Product testing: 
Before we create the final moulds to be used in DUO’s production, we will carry out final prototype testing. While we have a prototype that we think rocks, we won’t begin production until everything is perfect. 

Manufacturing: 
Our manufacturer is ready and raring to go and in possession of all the information needed. We don't foresee any difficulties, but if moulds need re-constructing this could mean delays. campaign.story:
FRANKENSTEIN is a fast-moving strategy game for 2-5 players ages 10 and up that takes 30-40 minutes to play… a monster-building game!
Play mad scientists competing to be the first to create life through the power of alchemy. Each turn, you may buy the offered body part, sell to an anatomist for a meager profit, or auction it, trying to get a better deal or rip off you opponents. You might be lucky and get a coffin with a weakling’s cadaver in it; or your involvement in the macabre trade might invoke the villager’s wrath.
 The events mini-expansion introduces new elements in the game where players will be affected by misfortunes or will get small advantages depending on what can happen to the villagers' anger. 
The events are presented in a small board guided by a marker that will be a fantastic bust of Frankenstein. The bust will be produced in limited units, is a piece of resin 50mm (1,96") height, hand painted in bone finish. 
Frankenstein bust detail, hand painted in bone finish
There's also, in a very limited way, a special edition with the bust of Frankenstein hand painted by the expert hands of Marta The Monster Box. It takes a lot of time to paint the bust with this level of detail, one by one, so we can offer only a limited batch of this collector item. 
Frankenstein bust hand-painted full color, limited units
The deluxe edition also contains a special booklet that simulates the look of an ancient book with illustrations from the time when Dr. Frankenstein was situated, as well as the mini-expansion rules, design sketches and game art.  
People is enjoying the game since it's very first version:
Note: All video reviews included correspond to the prototype of this edition and the materials shown are not final. Some text reviews or quotes correspond to previous versions of the game; this new edition comes with a new atmosphere and art, so we consider it important to highlight them. 
 Looks amazing! Creating the Mary Shelley's iconic monster is even better with the fantastic art of David G. Forés. Apart of the art, we will take a lot of care in production using premium components, like we did on our previous games.
 It's fun for all ages! Playing Frankenstein is a fun, exciting and suitable game for all audiences, whether they are great players, casual players or families with children.
 Exclusive contents: By supporting the Kickstarter campaign you can get unique content that will only be produced for our patrons, such as the fantastic Frankenstein miniature with the mini-expansion and the special "Dr. Frankenstein notebook".
 It's well tested and ready to play: Frankenstein is the third version of the original game of Yehuda Berlinger, it's extensively tested and we created this new version to recover a great game with a new and amazing atmosphere.
 You can trust: We have created and published more games in the past on Kickstarter so you can trust on our experience from the design to production and worldwide fulfillment. Our goal is always a proud backer!

Worldwide shipping: Our utmost responsibility, is to comply with our promise to produce and ship the product right to your home. This is why it would be imprudent to promise free or cut price delivery, so far removed from the real delivery costs involved. However, part of the international shipping cost is subsidized.
The shipping cost with discount applied is 7€ for UE/UK, 8€ for USA, 10€ for Canada and 12€ for the rest of the world.
By now we have shipped all kinds of products in different campaigns to countries all around the world, so it is part of the process which we know well.
This game is EU friendly and USA friendly.  All the EU games will be shipped from within the EU.
A few years ago I got my hands on a fun game called It's Alive! Although it was an amateur edition, the game immediately hooked us up, offering us lots of fun with friends and family. That little edition ended up disappearing, and the author decided to offer a different version dedicated to Hanukkah, Candle Quest. After a long time wearing down the early initial edition, we decided to rescue the classic and give it an edition at the height it deserves: a new and fascinating art by the expert hand of David G. Forés, a careful and professional edition with premium components, and new content such as the events mini-expansion  that will make the games even more fun. In addition, this mini-expansion is accompanied by an exclusive piece: a fantastic bust of the monster, hand-painted, that cannot be missing from your collection!
Invedars is an independent board games company from Barcelona, in Europe. We are the publishers of Ambar, Big Bang 13.7, Cthulhu Crusades and Castlecards, all them produced with the help of our backers on Kickstarter and local crowdfunding platforms. You can trust on us, as we are experienced on Kickstarter production and worldwide fulfillment.
Game Design: Yehuda Berlinger  
Art: David G. Forés  
Sculpture: Marta The Monster Box
Publisher: Invedars

campaign.story:
One Bluetooth-enabled device, such as your smartphone, can connect with one or two Cannons at the same time via Bluetooth, and the two speakers will automatically match to left and right channel to create a clear stereo sound. It sits snugly within the palm of your hand, making it very convenient to carry around. The Cannon portable TWS Bluetooth 5.0 speaker will excite you with enhanced audio performance, six hours playtime powered by a rechargeable battery, and noise-reduction built-in mic which supports hands-free phone calls, all in a compact body. Cannon is just perfect for backyard movie nights, parties, travels and a variety of indoor and outdoor activities.
 ENJOY TRUE WIRELESS STEREO SOUNDS
 If you have two Cannon speakers, you can use the TWS function to pair them together to have one play the left channel and the other as the right channel for full stereo sound. The two speakers can be easily and quickly connected via Bluetooth by pressing the button on the side. What’s more great about this stereo mode is that you can mount either speaker to any location you like, to fill the room much better with a more airy and open sound than any other comparable speaker.   
Cannon is small in size, but powerful in sound. Cannon features a full metal body, which can deliver a much louder and clearer sound. The sleek design makes it not just a powerful speaker, but also a decoration that can be brought anywhere.
  It doesn’t really matter what you’re doing—partying, hiking, camping, having dinner or hanging out. When a speaker this small sounds this amazing, you’ll never want to leave it behind. You can easily take it along in your hand, pocket, or bag. Wherever you need music, Cannon is ready to keep pace with all of your adventures and delivers unparalleled sound for its lightweight.  
 Cannon features Bluetooth 5.0 for a stable and consistent connection up to 33 feet away and high quality music streaming. You will not experience any connection losses, interference or dips in sound quality within the Bluetooth range. 
You will be truly impressed with the sound of Cannon, for it pumps out high quality, crystal clear, full-range sound with crisp highs, detailed midrange and punchy bass without even the slightest distortion when cranking up to maximum volume. The enhanced bass response stays where it should be without muddying into the midrange frequencies or overwhelming the other frequency ranges, and you can see the radiator vibrating like mini-subwoofer.  
 Cannon comes with a 500mAh rechargeable lithium battery that provides 6 hours of continuous music playtime on a single charge which is pretty incredible considering the small size of this speaker. You can play up to 120 songs before needing to recharge and the speaker recharges relatively quickly. Cannon has battery life long enough for you to take around outdoors, for travel, or to keep the party going throughout the night.  
 The outer body of Cannon is made of a whole piece of premium steel that forms an enclosure to produce a more genuine sound and deliver it to 360-degree range than the ones made of plastic or wood. The phenomenal audio performance makes Cannon suitable for setting up home theatre to provide cinematic sound. It is your go-to accessory for conjuring the magic out of music. 
 Cannon comes with a high-definition built-in microphone which allows you to conveniently take hands-free calls on your mobile device from virtually anywhere without delay. By pressing the button on the side, you can easily pick up/hang up the incoming calls.  
 The LED lights that surround the outer rim of the speaker at the bottom are nice to look at and they flash in different ways depending on whether the speaker is charging, paired or playing music. Cannon is designed to literally rock a party especially at night with its beautiful lighting. 
 The exterior metallic finish looks and sharp LED lights of Cannon are incredibly eye-catchy. The minimalist and rugged design is not only cool to look at, but also improves the durability of the speaker. 
Cannon is compatible with virtually any Bluetooth enabled device including iPhone, Android smartphones, iPads, tablets and laptops. The speaker pairs with your music sources in a matter of seconds and automatically pairs with the last device when turned on.

campaign.story:
When was the last time you entered your bathroom with confidence? Probably when you were home alone. But when you're not alone, you can never be sure. Common deodorizers are useless unless they're used, and expecting someone to use it twice a day, 365 days a year just ain't practical.
PLAY

No messy installation. Simply attach Toipal to the side of your toilet and you're done.
Zero dependency on other people's kindness to cover their tracks. That's what Toipal is all about.
Toipal refills contain 4oz (120mL) of formula that last for ~180 uses, about two months in a two-person bathroom.
Toipal doesn't just prevent bad odor. It creates a good one. The formula is 100% biodegradable, infused with fragrances that fill the room with refreshing aromas during and after use. Two fragrances are currently available with many more on the way:
Snap the cover, replace the empty refill with a new one and enjoy two more months of peace.
To ensure Toipal fits any toilet, we've added three suction cups in different sizes to the package that cover 99% of toilets.

K2 is a super tactile mechanical keyboard featuring the largest battery seen in a mechanical keyboard yet. With 84-keys, K2 is a perfect combination of full-sized mechanical keyboard and ten-keyless keyboard. With dual connectivity (wireless or wired) and both Windows and Mac layouts, the K2 is a perfect fit for any desk. It easily pairs with up to three devices at once and increase your productivity.  
Designed for versatility, the K2 connects via Bluetooth or with a cable. It can connect with your phone, laptop or iPad. Connect wirelessly with up to three devices at once and switch between screens for efficient multitasking and increased productivity. You can also use our type-C cable to connect the keyboard to your devices. Switch between the operating systems with just a toggle slide on the K2.
K2 is perfectly compatible with all operating systems (OS) from Mac/iOS to Android to Windows, and you can easily switch among different OS. 
Click the image to check high resolution K2 layout
K2 is one of the few mechanical keyboards featuring Mac layout media keys. It allows you to use all the same media keys as a conventional macOS. Every K2 keyboard comes with 3 specific keycaps for Mac and Windows, respectively.

Setting a best example of efficient space usage, K2 has a compact 84 key design by retaining all the essential functional keys like Page Up/Down, Home, End, and Screen capture (command+shift+4) which are important for your productivity. With N-key rollover (NKRO on wired mode only) you can register as many keys as you can press at once without missing out characters.
We had a strong desire to design a wireless mechanical keyboard that everyone would love to use for everyday work. The CNC processed streamline aluminum frame and the plastic frame perfectly represent minimalism and protection to K2. 
Curved profile keycaps create an unbeatable finger touch feeling and the 6-degree typing angle is the most comfortable hand typing experience. 
No matter what you like -- linear, clicky or something in between -- we’ve got you covered with three Gateron switch options (Blue, Brown, Red). With a lifespan of 50 million keystrokes, we want to make sure that you experience the same feedback for every keystroke. 

Check out above video for blue, brown and red switch typing sound on K2 keyboard.
Keychron K2 is engineered with more than 15 types of RGB backlight and comes with different styles (flashing, breathing, or static etc) which will match up to your mood. Simply press the lightbulb key or fn + right arrow to achieve it.

 Please see above is a video shows all the RGB lighting and static lighting effects of the K2. 

With a battery of 4000 mAh K2 has 25% more battery capacity than Apple Magic keyboard, 2.7x more than Logitech Craft Keyboard, 4x more than Hexgears X1 and two times more than the Keychron K1 Keyboard. This ensures that K2 lasts as long as it can with a single charge.

campaign.story:
Sideshow Swap! is a delightfully strategic and playfully competitive game that will have your friends trying to figure out how you won and why they didn't. Whether it's family game night or you're with your grownup pals, you're sure to have a blast! If this sounds like the kind of game you're into, then please help us make this a reality. We are passionate about great gaming experiences, and we think you'll love Sideshow Swap! as much as we do.
-Phil & Adam 



 SKIP TO SEE: 0:20 – Intro | 1:48 – Game Play | 13:23 – Final Thoughts 
SKIP TO SEE: 2:04 – Game Setup | 4:40 – Game Play | 9:53 – Final Thoughts
We are professional problem solvers, and we have learned how to properly design and craft experiences. We have led user experience and design teams for Fortune 20 companies leading to our work seen by millions. We applied that same technique, love, and care to Sideshow Swap! and it has been play tested, played, or reviewed in 15 states already! We've worked really hard so far and are thrilled to see players' reactions at the end of each game.
"The noblest art is that of making others happy” - P.T. Barnum
We hope this game makes you happy. Thank you for visiting our page. We can't make this game without your help. 
Want to thank our amazing wives, Rebecca and Jessica for their patience and sacrifice as well as all of our family and friends for putting up with our constant badgering. Special thanks to Brandon Gill, Jonah Carl and Peter Von Buskirk - your contributions helped make this the game it is today.
- Phillip James and Adam Stevenson 
Shipping will be charged separately by our pledge manager after the campaign is completed. Estimates provided below.  We're working with our pledge manager to facilitate customs in your country. Please contact us if you would like an estimate for a country not listed.
US: $6 • Canada & Mexico: $8 • Most of Western Europe, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, China, Hong Kong, and others: $10 • Local Pickup option for Producer Edition Reward Tier.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We’re first time game makers but have extensive experience in large scale product development and management, specifically with projects of print and software products. We have been preparing ourselves for months to understand and figure out the best way to produce and deliver this game. Because our game is significantly developed (about 95% complete) and has undergone hundreds of hours of play-testing to ensure the best play experience, we’ll be ready to start the manufacturing process shortly after the campaign ends and orders are confirmed through the pledge manager. The biggest foreseeable risks, like with most other projects manufactured overseas, are delays in production, shipping, and customs. We will be woking with a pledge manager to mitigate these risks and have mentors within the industry to further guide us. While this is our first game, it isn't our first Kickstarter campaign. Phil ran a modest campaign that successfully funded, and understands front-to-end the demands of post-campaign Kickstarter.

After over 50 days and an unbelievable 14,000 miles in transit, we have finally received the lion's share shipment of Sideshow Swap! updates.update_userinfo: Holy Cow the Atlantic is Huge!
updates.update_content:
Hello Sideshow Cast and Showmen!
As our ship departs the Spanish coast and steams across the Atlantic, we're excited to announce that all of our UK and EU backers have been fulfilled. Big thanks to our fulfillment partner Collext who helped organize that effort. If you are lucky enough to already have a copy of Sideshow Swap!, please become a fan on Board Game Geek, and rate the game -- It makes a world of difference to independent game makers like us here at Cannonball Arcade.

We're beyond excited to announce that Sideshow Swap! has hit the open water! Through a series of interconnected and intricate deals involving regional order quantities, we were able to get all of the copies out of port before Chinese New Year.  This is big, because we were facing a several week delay as the manufacturer (and all the rest of China) observers their holiday period. At the end of the day, we ended up splitting our shipments into two loads--one for the UK/EU and one for the rest of the world--and low an behold, copies have already reached our UK fulfillment partner! Labels are being created and you lucky dogs will be receiving your games soon!

Printing update for Sideshow Swap! backers - 
It's gorgeous!
We hit a big milestone in creating Sideshow Swap! today, in that we approved the final MPC (manufacturer's proof copy).  All the copies are printed, and they assembled and sent us one as final check.  Now that we've approved it, I imagine it'll take a couple of days for them to get the rest assembled and shrink wrapped, then they'll be on a boat (or a plane for EU backers) and headed to fulfillment centers.  In the meantime, here's our unboxing video showing the Sideshow Swap! First Tour edition and the Shenanigans Expansion:

campaign.story:
Introducing Nighthawk: the perfectly fitted Spring-Summer bomber jacket - redesigned for functional city living.
Meticulously engineered to be the perfect combination of function and form, Nighthawk is a better, more practical urban jacket, providing streamlined smart features without adding bulk.  
KEY FEATURES
Each sleeve features a purpose-built pocket to fit any contactless card. Use one for effortless tapping in and out of transport; the other for smooth contactless payments, all without ever having to reach into your jacket.     
Tangled headphone clumps are a thing of the past, with built-in headphone cable hangers and access points for seamless connection to your phone, stored in a custom-designed pocket allowing easy access for taking calls and switching between songs.    
We’ve also included two dedicated pockets for storing your Bluetooth earphone case, keys or coins,  thoughtfully placed for secured storage and easy acce 
For jotting down your thoughts or designing on the go, we’ve included a custom-fitted pocket for storing your Apple pencil, or simply your favourite pen.   
Our performance-centered Spacewalk fabric is waterproof and windproof, without compromising breathability and comfort.  
Zippered pockets both on the outside and the inner lining provide added security for your passport, wallet and phone. The outer zippers are reinforced with water-repellent coating to keep your items safe no matter the weather.  
Nighthawk: the urban bomber jacket created for the modern man.  
 Size Chart & How to Measure 
 2019-03-23 Update: as promised in the coming days we will be releasing photos of our customers wearing Nighthawk for more visual sizing references, stay tuned!
Measurement Method 1: measure your own body
Sleeve: Measure from the shoulder line to the bottom of the sleeve 
Chest: Measure under the arms at the fullest part around the chest/bust horizontally.
Waist: Measure around your waist at the narrowest part
Hips (Sweep): With the feet together measure around fullest part.

Measurement Method 2:
1. Find a jacket you have that you feel fits you the best
2. Measure the below 4 places:
Sleeves
Length
Chest 
Waist
Hip (Sweep) - this is the elastic band at the bottom of the jacket
3. Find the closest matching size from the sizing chart 

Measurement Method 3: 
1. Send us an email to hello@zeluslondon.com, and tell us your:
Height (cm)
Weight (kg)
Usual T-shirt size and jacket/blazer size
What best to describe your BUILD: e.g. skinny, slim, average, athletic, muscly, larger build
*What best to describe your ARM LENGTH and SHOULDERS: e.g. "I think I have short arms, small shoulders", "I have longer arms than most people, and broad shoulders" 
What's your preferred fit: tight fit, slim-fit, regular fit, lose fit, oversized fit
2. We will then recommend the best fit for you

PLEASE NOTE:
1. The above measurements represent the actual measurements of the jacket in each location
2. Jackets are meant to be worn over other layers, so don’t size exactly. You'll need to leave space for wearing additional layers under the jacket, such as a t-shirt and sweater.
3. We will provide further sizing guidelines and examples of different sized people wearing Nighthawk jackets later on which will be sent out towards the end of the campaign.
4. Please don't hesitate to ask if you have a question, we are here to help!

Our Customers Wearing Nighthawk (more images to be updated in the coming days):
*We will have more photos to release later on this week during the post campaign survey stage.

PROJECT TIMELINE 

SHIPPING - As soon as the campaign is over, you’ll be mailed a link for a survey. The Survey will ask for size choice. Please ensure this is filled out promptly once camping ends to avoid delays with your order.
RETURNS - Most Kickstarter campaigns do not have return policies. We do. If you find a manufacturer’s defect, or have received the wrong size, you have 30 days to exchange. 
To follow our return procedure, please post the item to the address included in our Customer Return Form (comes with the parcel), and email us:
Your postal receipt to hello@zeluslondon.com 
Your name/address and order number (which was given when the purchase was made).
Once we have received the returned item and verified its condition, we will refund the initial purchase amount and the postal cost paid by the customer.
ABOUT ZELUS LONDON
ZELUS LONDON™ is an apparel designer, manufacturer, and retailer based in London, United Kingdom. Taking inspiration from artists and thought leaders like Jiri Thyn, Ido Portal and Alan Watts, the brand stands for simplicity. All our garments are designed to create the perfect balance between function and form. Our popular t-shirts are created with Nanoflex, a bespoke performance fabric made to fit like your own skin, while being soft, stretchy and breathable. 
Now, we are proud to present our latest brainchild, the Nighthawk jacket. We have teamed up with expert suppliers from around the world to craft a new, functional bomber jacket for urban living. The features of this jacket have been carefully curated to streamline your everyday city experience without adding bulk. 
We believe that simplicity has the power to enhance your performance: there’s a reason that Einstein rotated five identical suits and Steve Jobs never deviated from his iconic black turtleneck and jeans. It has been proven again and again that the burden of decision-making wears you down. By minimising lower-order decision-making, energy is conserved for the things that really matter. 
The Nighthawk jacket was created to streamline your focus by lifting the burden of tiny everyday stressors: deciding what to wear, the feeling of dread when you can’t find your credit card, tangled headphone clumps. At ZELUS LONDON, we believe that simplicity is the ultimate form of sophistication. That’s why we think that Apple’s chief designer, Jonathan Ives, had it right when he said that ‘design is at its best and its most empowering when it simply disappears.’
We hope that Nighthawk appeals to you, the city dwellers that it was created for. Your support will allow us to continue to create streamlined, innovative and beautiful clothing, including a women’s line and winter jacket. 

 OUR TEAM

campaign.story:
A game that will last forever. 
BILIKO® is a brand new board game, based on physics: its secret is a never seen before game mechanic, that makes two players compete at the limits of equilibrium! 
Just a few rules to remember, many strategies to plan. BILIKO® is a game for everyone: adults and children, casual and hardcore gamers.
Each match lasts just enough to be a challenge, but never so long to become boring. Anyhow, it just leads to another one. 
We designed and engineered BILIKO® in Italy, and we are proud of it. Because for us it is more than a game, it is a piece of design. 
Strengths
For everyone: Suited for children and casual gamers: just a few rules to remember! 
Many strategies: A game for competitions, with many variants: suited for hardcore gamers! 
Fastpaced: More frenetic than chess, more tactical than tic-tac-toe: each match just leads to another one. 
Italian: Designed, engineered and produced in Italy: a piece of design. 
A brand new classic
In BILIKO® two players challenge each other by positioning, on a game board resting on a half-sphere, pawns of different weights. 
The score assigned to each move is based on the weight of the pawn and on its distance from the center of the game board ... the higher the risk, the higher the gain! 
BILIKO® was awarded "best game" at Microsoft Imagine Cup 2016 Italian finals: https://ischool.startupitalia.eu/news/52891-20160321-microsoft-imagine-cup-2016-italia

updates.update_content:
BILIKO - RULES OF THE GAME
The two players must place theirs placeholders on one’s own half (red or blue) of the circular panel (the game board) in order to achieve the highest possible score. While doing this, the two players must pay attention not to let the game board touch the ground (BILIKO!), since the circular panel is in a precarious balance on a hemisphere. Each player can place at most 10 placeholder on his half to be picked among 30 placeholders shared by the players ( 10 white, 10 yellow, 10 black).
- The player who, by placing a placeholder, makes the gameboard touch the ground (BILIKO!) lose.

campaign.story:
Brexit: The Real Deal is a game of bidding, blocking and bluffing for trade deals. Making sure you never back down from your decisions, no matter how badly it May go. So hold your head up high, play your hand and convince everyone that no-one can stand in your way.
Based in a post Brexit UK where the people have decided that something didn't quite feel right after we had left the EU. Everyone got together and agreed we needed one more vote. It was time to devolve the UK. So it broke up into it's natural member states, England, Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland and Cornwall.
Now you play as one of these countries trying to form trade deals with the rest of the world before the other players can. You'll need to bluff, bid and even destroy other people's trade deals as the game continues to an ultimate winner. You may not want a trade deal with France, but you sure can't let Scotland have it!
Each player draws a hidden agenda at the beginning of the game. This may be to rejoin the EU, it may be to stall for as long as possible. No-one knows yours but you. You have to complete your hidden agenda, while trying to work out everyone else's and stop them completing theirs.
We spent 350 million developing this game and we hope you enjoy it!
 Brexit: The Real Deal: Classic mode 3-5 players, approx play time: 15-25 minutes.
 Parliamentary edition: 2 players, approx play time: may never end. 
 Front bench edition: Players may change without warning, play time: 15 mins ~ 2 years.
Laurence O'Brien - Owner of wotan games -  After school I was drawn into playtesting Wotan Games with the opportunities of the heady high life of boardgame Design and publishing. However even with successful games, life has a tendency to move you on to other pathways and journeys. After a few decades I decided to knee fate in the nads and get back into Games Publishing, this time higher up in the echelons of risk and glory.  Now as the owner of Wotan Games I am gathering a team of talented people around me to produce Internationally appealing games for all types of players. 
Art and game design by - Russell Neal - Endeavoring to create exciting games that fuse fantasy, reality and fun game mechanics to make games for all peoples of all ages.

campaign.story:
Russia: 1787. Empress Catherine the Great is taking a surprise  trip down the Dnieper River to survey her new kingdom. This will take  her directly past your old, unremarkable village. You don’t have the  time or money to make your village impressive, but with a few pieces of timber and some strategically placed facades you could certainly make  your village seem impressive. 
In POTEMKIN EMPIRE, up to five players attempt to impress Empress Catherine by convincing her that they have the most prosperous village in the land. You don’t have much time or money, so you’ll just have to set up empty building facades along the river to make your town look impressive.
Draft and assign interior cards to decide which of your buildings are real or fake. Score points by exposing your opponents' fake buildings, or by passing off your fakes as real. Each building you can add to your town has a unique ability, so choose the buildings you construct carefully. Some will earn you points whether they’re real or not, but beware of your enemies’ spies!
Potemkin Empire is a strategic city building, bluffing game for 3-5 players that plays in 45 minutes. For more information, we encourage you to view the videos directly below, or simply read our draft rulebook here.
Note that anything marked with these symbols are: 
Kickstarter Exclusive - An exclusive item for Kickstarter backers with remaining stock available through conventions and special promotions only.
 Potemkin Empire is the 48th project from the combined teams behind Indie Boards and Cards & Action Phase Games. With the successful execution of our first 47 projects, we have become experienced publishers with a reputation for great games (in design and production) that are delivered in a timely fashion. 
 Potemkin Empire was a finalist at the Geekway Design Contest which had over 100 entrants from across the country.
 Potemkin Empire was designed by the talented Jonathan Woodard. This game has undergone extensive testing and development to ensure the best possible experience. We are confident that this game will be in your collection for years to come. 
 Potemkin Empire is an interesting cross-section between empire building games and bluffing games. The empire you build is three-dimensional, which provides a beautiful table presence that is deeply tied into the historical theme behind the story of Gregori Potemkin. The best part about the bluffing element is that you are never put on the spot to lie about the authenticity of your buildings.
Like other empire building games, there are several different strategies that can be employed. Since every type of building is always available no matter what cards you are dealt, every strategy is open to every player! The key to winning will be determining which strategy is best to pursue against your current opponents' strategies.
All of the art assets are complete and ready for immediate upload after the project funds.

campaign.story:
In Misdirection, 2-8 players are pitted against each other in a fight for survival. With a global enemy in play, players don't directly attack each other but instead force other players to play cards they might not want to, resulting in backing them into a corner. You'll need to steal, sabotage, skip and trick your opponent to get ahead!
Misdirection was designed and developed for new-comers and veterans of the tabletop gaming scene that love a small-box theme. Play-tested by players of all ages; from as low as 7 to as old as 60, we've proudly developed a game that is quick to learn, full of laughs and a fun experience for all backgrounds. 
We feel the game is ideal for travelling and as a gateway game, as well as a filler for games when you're waiting for other people to arrive to your game night or between games to break things up...
Key Features:
Easy to learn, teach and play.
Indirect player-interaction creating a unique game.
Varying unique global enemies, changing each game.
Big game, small box.

Small Box:
We're proud of the small box game we've created - we feel there is so much replay value in such a small box, making it ideal for travel. With a tiny learning curve, it's an easy game to get people that aren't into tabletop games to have a play!
Actual box design may vary from picture - the size will not change.
 You can view the rules here! 
The duration of a game of Misdirection is based on how many players there are, that corresponds to how many life points players get each;
2 Players = 6 life points
3-4 Players = 5 life points
5-8 Players = 4 life points
Players shuffle the enemy card deck, and randomly deal one face up in the middle of the table. This is the enemy for this round, read the enemy details carefully, each enemy plays differently and will force you to change your tactics!
The action card deck is shuffled and one card is placed in front of each player. The remaining cards are placed to the side of the enemy in play. 
On each player's turn, they pick up a card, and chose one of their two cards in their hand to play. You cannot pass, all players must play one card - sometimes this will mean playing a card you don't want too.
As you play a card, you must read it out exactly as it's worded on the card and place it on the other side of the enemy in play, then you action it depending on what the card says.
When a player is reduced to no life cubes, they're dead and can't participate in the game any longer. The last surviving player wins the game.
Misdirection is filled with many different enemies all with different abilities. Each enemy will change the way you play your cards -- what you play against the Skeleton, might not be the same you play against the Brigand.
All enemies were brought to life by the amazingly talented Anthea Wright.
Skeleton
Not the smartest of enemies, but if you slip up, the Skeleton will certainly let you know with a swift whack with it's sword.
Skeleton Wizard
An unnatural being well versed in dark magic, the Skeleton Wizard is known for attacking not just it's target, but anything it can.
Assassin
The shadows move as the Assassin emerges into light. She's highly trained and deadly with her dagger. She will not hesitate to stab an unsuspecting enemy dealing incredible damage.
Brigand
A brute with only one goal, to make as much coin as possible. The brigand is a brute and can attack with great force, but you could use this to your advantage if you knew the language he spoke.

Evil Mage
Not your normal mage, this cunning spell-weaver uses her dark magic to turns the tables and adapt to any battle with great force. 
Conjuror
This witch-doctor works with the foulest of ingredients to turn battles to their advantage with each attack.

Troll
Temperatures drop as this frost giant approaches. While not the strongest of attackers, he is slow and his attacks can be used to your advantage, if you know how.
Dragon
Flesh, blood and fire; a creature of immense power, with an extremely dangerous attack. You're not the only one in danger when the Dragon strikes. Sometimes it could be a benefit to take a hit yourself. Or two.
Goblin
This warmongering creature has little love for anything but it's own kind. Only tempted by bloodshed, he can't be bribed with shiny objects or be fooled by shifty tactics.
The Goblin is only available in the promo pack; free with all Kickstarter backers, purchasable at a later date.





Follow Games with Teeth on Facebook | Join Misdirection on Facebook!
Artist: Anthea Wright's Website | Facebook
We're proud members of TGDA, an Australian based Tabletop Design community.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
* * * * * * THIS KICKSTARTER IS IN AUSTRALIAN DOLLARS * * * * * *
Please note: We've done our best with the conversion rates, but please keep in mind, it may fluctuate through the campaign.

Misdirection as a game is complete and with artwork being majority completed, our main Risks and Challenges lie in adhering to our manufacturer's schedule and any shipping delays that may occur. We've set our deadline to complete everything and send it off to the manufacturer before the middle of May, they estimate late July to complete production. With that being said, please note that all artwork may be subject to change, including but not limited to card designs and box design and details.

For full transparency, we're proudly using Whatz Games based in China for our manufacturing. While we considered numerous publishers; the quality that Whatz Games has shown us along with their impressive product line, has ensured we're going to deliver a high-quality product for the lowest price possible to our customers.

To keep costs as low as we can, we'll be moving the completed product to a fulfillment center in China and shipping it to the world from there.

Please note that we do NOT ship to Brazil, Italy or Russia due to shipping inconsistencies and packages being lost or stolen. If you're from one of these countries, please contact a friend or family member in another country to pledge for you. Pledges from these countries will be refunded.

We investigated about using shipping hubs located in Australia, Europe and the United States, but that would mean we would have to add minimum of at least $10USD to each copy and for a game of this price-point, we didn't feel that people would be happy paying such a significant amount.

Risks and challenges
"Anything that gets your blood racing is probably worth doing." This qualifies, but making new things is also tough! This is my fourth Kickstarter campaign, and we've now shipped to over 2,000 backers over the course of our last three campaigns. Thrive presents some additional manufacturing challenges due to the unique components. We're equipped to deliver unique components. Just look at our last project, Swordcrafters.

I'm approaching product development and testing with rigor and will put product quality before timing if needed. My board game publisher and Kickstarter experiences, as well as my day job as a packaging engineer, will be my foundation to deliver a great product and campaign. My money-back guarantee displays my confidence in the game and any challenges that we face.

I will communicate along the way. You'll know if anything unexpected happens and I will do my best to make it right. I am building a track record of delivering games on time meeting project deadlines and avoiding unexpected shipping delays. The gameplay is solid with little to no tweaks expected. The expansion is being rigorously developed which gives you an opportunity to help influence it. The artwork is paid for and final files are on track for completion before the end of the project.

Thanks so much for checking out our project. I would be humbled if you back me. Let's plant this lotus pond and Thrive together!

Below is a brief explanation of how to set up, and play a turn of Area 1851: Express. However, if you prefer a video tutorial, we have one of those after the gifs. If you are one of those types that prefer to learn by reading the rules, you're in luck because this is a link to the up-to-date rules.

Setup
Place the Reputation and Effect tokens into separate piles where all players can reach them. Shuffle the 6 Thing cards and set them face down near the tokens. Now, shuffle all of the Scrap cards together and deal 7 to each player. Set the remaining Scrap cards face down into a draw pile near the Thing cards. You’re now ready for the first turn!

Playing a turn
During the turn, each player will be looking at a hand of cards and choose one of those cards to play. Once they have done so, they will place it face down in front of them and wait for all other players to do the same. After each player has “locked in” their selection, all players will reveal their cards simultaneously.
The card revealed can be used to start a new gadget, modify an existing gadget, put into a player’s scrap heap or discarded to draw a Thing card.
After all of the revealed cards have been fully played and resolved, players then pass their hand of cards around the table.

Delivering Gadgets
If any of the Gadgets being worked on have been completed (all of their attachment points are full) those gadgets must now be delivered. 
When delivering, be sure to read aloud the crazy contraption you just made! (Look at this Lead Coated Pony with an Ill Temper that Flies Erratically!) 
Take an amount of Rep tokens equal to the total Rep value of all cards being delivered (Including any bonus Rep from effects on the cards being delivered.) Be sure to activate any extra effects from the icons on the gadget, such as getting scrap for free or effect tokens to be used on a later turn.
After 3 rounds of 7 cards, the game will come to an end. Players add up all of their Rep that they have earned and get a few extra Rep from any tokens that they didn’t end up using. The player with the highest total Reputation has proven just how amazing of a Tinkerer they are, and win!

How to Play Video
Stella and Tarrant from Meeple University walk you through the process of learning to play Area 1851: Express.

Now that you know how to play, down load the Print and Play version of Area 1851: Express and try it out for yourself.

We will be doing stretch goals a little different this time around. We will list out the complete list of goals from the start as well as how much we need to raise to be able to unlock them.
You will also notice that there are not as many goals either, this is because we don't want to needle you with a bunch of tiny goals, we want each goal to mean something.
We are doing this for a few reasons, first and foremost we like to be as transparent as we can with our campaigns, secondly we only want to include known things that won't delay the project.
We are doing shipping a little different this time around. We want our funding goal to accurately represent what we need to produce Area 1851 Express. Because of this, shipping will not be added on to your pledge amount in Kickstarter. This is because any shipping you would add to your pledge, would add on to the funds raised to help create the project, but that's not entirely accurate. You would have contributed a portion of that to the project, and another portion to the shipping of the rewards. This could lead to a situation where we "Successfully Fund" by meeting our goal, when in reality we only raised half as much as we need, because half of that money is allocated for shipping costs.
With that in mind we've calculated the cost to ship this game to backers around the world and we're subsidizing that to help keep your costs down. We will be locking down the expected shipping cost for you, the backer, depending on where in the world you happen to be receiving your rewards.
Here is how much shipping you should expect to pay for in the pledge manager after the campaign:
USA - $5.00
Canada, EU, Asia and Australia/NZ - $12-15 (No VAT in our "Customs Friendly" countries)
Everywhere Else - $20-$22 (Potentially VAT as well)
We are working to have proper fulfillment centers around the world to deal with keeping the project a little more friendly in terms of shipping. As we get those deals worked out we will let everyone know, and pass the savings along.
Our friends over at Thing 12 Games have a great idea going on their Dinos Not Assembled Kickstarter campaign so we want to use the same concept!
What we are hearing retailers say: The two big themes were Kickstarter advantages beyond distribution, and not wanting to have funds locked up in a Kickstarter campaign for a long duration of time.
So with our 'Retail Pledge', we are hoping to address those issues for our retailer partners. A $50 deposit gets you into our 'better than distribution' program.
You'll be able to get the game at better than distribution prices through Five24 Labs as long as you want to carry the game in your store.  You'll also have priority ahead of distributor orders.
Once you've backed at this tier let's start a conversation to understand what makes the most sense for your store. You won't need to pay the invoice until we have the product ready to ship out to you.
The $50 pledge will be a credit on your total invoice and we will be vetting retailers by their GAMA status.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Having now had two successful "Mint" game campaigns successfully funding, we have learned even more that I could have ever imagined. The number of things that can come up and lead to delays is staggering, and they are not always entirely foreseeable.

For example, the cardstock we had planned to use for the Mint Delivery campaign had become damaged, and the factory wouldn't have been able to get more in for several months, delaying the project close to 6 months with that one unforeseeable issue. We were able to dodge it by changing cardstock and letting everyone know what was going on.

Navigating issues like this has taught us a lot about ourselves, the process and you our amazing backers.

That said, it's always possible for things to get off track, and as we are ever committed to being transparent in our campaigns, we won't hesitate to let you know what’s going on, how we plan to deal with it or even ask for advice from you when the time comes.

Thanks for taking the time to read all of this, I’ll see you in the comments section.

-Justin

campaign.story:
Are you sitting? Check your posture right now.

Do you feel relaxed? How is your back? And your neck? Do you know how to seat correctly? Probably yes for the moment. But during long hours you start to feel the tension in neck and back. We have that covered. Infinity PAD is an ideal solution to sit in perfect posture effortlessly, easing back pain.
We tend to develop poor posture at an early age. These sitting habits stick with us and we fail to realize how much it affects us everyday.
The Infinity PAD presents a simple and effective solution to all our sitting problems:

The Infinity PAD is a seat enhancement that upgrades your existing chair into a posture corrector by introducing dynamic and ergonomic sitting positions. 
It was created as a one-stop solution for all of the problems associated with sitting.





Many professions require more than 8 hours of sitting per day. That means sitting for more than 100,000 hours in one lifetime. 
Imagine how this can affect your body, especially if you’re sitting incorrectly... 
It is impossible for many of us to avoid sitting, which is why the Infinity PAD is the perfect solution.
The Infinity PAD also has long-term benefits. It introduces and instills proper sitting habits. When maintained over a sustained period, it will train your sitting muscles to work even when you aren't using the Infinity PAD.


Simply placing the Infinity PAD on your existing chair introduces a balance point to your seat. This balance point naturally pulls your body into a position of proper posture. How? The body's natural reaction to the balance point is to sit with your head up, shoulders back, and chest out. 

It tilts the pelvis forward, creating a healthy S-curve in your spine. 
It also engages and trains key sitting muscles in your body, including your back, legs, and core.
The Infinity PAD is designed for use in a variety of everyday activities. 
You can use it while you work, study, eat, read, watch TV, or meditate—virtually anything that you usually do sitting down. You can even use the Infinity PAD on the floor for yoga or strength and balance exercises. 
The Infinity PAD is designed for consistent and convenient use. The product can be paired with one designated chair, or it can be easily transferred between multiple areas in your home or workplace.
It really is as simple as placing the Infinity PAD on your existing seat and sitting on it. This makes it a versatile product for any office or household. However you choose, sustained use of the Infinity PAD will lead to improved sitting habits.
The InfinityPAD comes in one ready-to-use piece. There is no assembly required. 

The InfinityPAD is a lightweight and resilient product that is designed to last. It is made to withstand the same weight as standard chairs. 
Since its height is not adjustable, it pairs best with chairs and/or desks with adjustable heights. It can also be adapted for use with floors and other surfaces.
Hi! My name is Alojz and I am the creator of the Infinity PAD. As a school teacher and adult educator, I've seen every possible variation of poor posture. Observing my students, I noticed that the more fatigue, stress, and pain they felt, the more likely they were to slouch or lean into worse postures.
I've seen this cycle in my students and I even experienced this myself. 
I tried many other posture-correcting products on the market but what I found was either expensive or involved wearing tedious devices. 
I knew there was a simple and effective solution waiting to be discovered. After researching the market and a careful planning stage, I finally developed the Infinity PAD—a posture-correcting product that was affordable, convenient, and comfortable.
After 2 years of researching and consulting with professionals, I developed the Infinity PAD. 
It is produced in a boutique workshop in Slovenia and crafted with locally sourced materials. 

Now I need your help to scale the production, and help others. 


With your backing, I will be able to produce the Infinity PAD with a variety of textiles. This will allow customization of the fabric and color, adding a personal touch. You can choose whether your Infinity PAD blends in seamlessly or stands out and makes a statement.  

The Infinity PAD is made of just a few key materials.
These durable yet lightweight materials have been carefully selected with longevity in mind. Without any overly complicated parts, the chance of any component failure is minimized and, in the event of failure, easily repaired with our help.



With the help of your generous backing, I plan to roll out the Infinity PAD following the below schedule. This timeline will allow me to ensure that each InfinityPAD is perfect before we send it to you, our very first backers.

campaign.story:
Crave is a dynamic new deck building card game, featuring modern day Vampires vs Vampire Hunters. You'll battle your opponent and use your influence to bring new characters, spells, actions, and items to your side. Each game is unique based upon what you see available to acquire, in addition to the varying paths you and your opponent may take.
We've taken a unique modern-day approach to fantasy creatures and imagined what they would look like today.
Guinness the Giant, Zoe the Elf, Zelda the Centaur, Dolores the Griffin, and Nessa the Unicorn
CRAVE is a new style of deck builder, featuring these unique mechanisms and attributes:
Mutual card purchasing market PLUS personal markets
Asymmetric starting hands and unique cards exclusive to your side
Some cards you acquire are placed into your opponent's deck
New keywords and special abilities
Beautiful, oversized tarot-sized cards
Modern-day fantasy creatures
You'll battle your opponent and use your influence to make your deck more powerful. You'll bring in new characters, including new fantastic Enchanted creatures, Groupies, Werewolves, and even poisonous Plants which you'll drop straight into your opponent's deck.
Equip items to characters, and create special combinations unique to your side, whether you are a Vampire or Vampire Hunter. Use Patrols to block your opponent, and poison their deck with Wolfsbane and other plants. Win by draining your opponent's health before they do the same to you in your battle to survive. - What are the 6 different factions?
Crave features two completely different styles of play, depending on your unique starting cards. While Vampires use special spells, drain energy, and turn Groupies to their own side, Vampire Hunters will use dexterity, healing, and marketplace benefits to try and win.
Modern-day Vampires

Plus 1 cheat sheet card of keywords and 2 life tracker cards for each side. Then another 70 cards in the middle public market so that each game is unique. Each card is over-sized (tarot size cards).
