campaign.story:
Lord of the Chords is the punniest, geekiest, most secretly educational music theory card game in the world! The card game that musicians play when they're not playing music!

Press Ctrl+f and search for the keywords to skip to the section you want to look at! E.g. search for "Shipping" to jump to the portion on Shipping!
WOW
You get a chord! They get a chord! Everybody gets a chord!
Rewards
Was the pun too much of a strrrrreeeeetch?
 SGD $55 Minor Edition

"I got you a GIF!"
SGD $88 Major Package



SGD $288 Augmented Package


Rewards Summary
 Initially, we laser-cut a keyboard-shaped box from thick cardboard to store our cards, just for fun. To our surprise, people went crazy over the box! There were actually some people who bought our early test version of the game just for the box, without even trying the game! We knew we had something special on our hands.
"I love the box!" - Jordan Rudess
However, it was definitely not feasible to handcraft all the boxes! And the cardboard version wasn't durable enough. Most people told us to just go with a normal cardboard box since it would be easier but we wanted our backers to feel the same sense of amazement we did so we're glad to announce we've found a great manufacturer in China who's working with us to design the box!
Add-ons
Stretch Goals



Gameplay
There's a small mistake in the video - can you spot it? ;)
Check out our rulebook here, it's currently a work in progress hosted on Google Docs. Feel free to comment and offer feedback :) 
Public Reception
 Gameplay video with Kirsten Long and Wanning Wong (full time musicians and music teachers)!
 Listen to our interview with Shelly Davis from PianoParentPodcast!
 Video interview with The Cardboard Stacker:
The Dream Team
The Wusbands - "Work Husbands"
We are just 3 Musically-inclined(hence the theme), Engineering-trained(hence the box) and Game-addicted(hence the game) guys from Singapore(hence the asian parents forcing us to learn music). 
We had a horrible experience learning music theory when we were younger.  We created this game because we want to transform that terrible experience into a terrific experience, and we believe we can - with your help! 
While this is our first Kickstarter, all 3 of us have backed Kickstarter projects before and we each bring strong complementary skills to form a great team. From video filming to digital marketing to game design to publicity outreach, the three of us have been hard at work daily to chase our dreams. We've tried to do as much of it by ourselves as possible so that we can ensure that every part of this campaign and journey retains the style, humor and quality that we've promised with the game.
If you’re into geeky Musical references and epic Composer puns, Pliszt Bach us and help us to make this game a reality. 
Check out Jonathan's Medium Article for the detailed composition of our bach story, filled with lots of be-haydn-the-scenes action and accounts of our crazy sustained hustling.
Thank you! - Keith, Jon and Jun Yu
Additional Notes
Why support us on Kickstarter
We need your help to fund the production of Lord of the Chords and make it the best music card game ever. As a backer, you'll also help us unlock stretch goals that will improve key components of the game for everyone.
In return, we're offering major discounts for both the Minor and Major tiers from the MSRP and we'll make sure that all backers get their copies before retail release. 
Work together with us! Music theory can be complicated and downright different between countries and cultures. We love hearing your feedback and advice and we've already been receiving lots of advice from supporters pre-campaign that has helped us made many useful changes to the game.
Translations and Musical Variations
All of the below options will be available as choices on the backer survey we will send out at the end of the campaign. Select the options you want and we will make sure you get the best version of the game for you!
Language options available:
English (default)
 Spanish
German
Game content options available:
Default version (with crotchets and Bflat)
EU version (Bflat becomes B and B becomes H)
American version (Differences in rhythm terminology - "crotchets" become "quarter notes")
If you know of other differences or things we should take into account, please let us know! Here is a Google Sheet with descriptions and translations for the Minor Edition. Feel free to add translations in your own language!
Manufacturing, Shipping and Pledge Manager
Manufacturing
We are currently working together with WhatzGames (King of Tokyo, Krosmaster Quest, Antidote) to produce our game components and IdealHard (Robo3D, Body Boss) to manufacture our box - both in China. Both companies have great records of working with Kickstarter campaigns and we have been in close communication with the companies pre-launch.
Shipping
Shipping will not be charged during the campaign. It will be charged through the pledge manager after the campaign based on the actual costs incurred to ship. This is so we can be fair to all our backers as shipping is rarely one size fits all, and also give you more stretch goodies and possibly a choice of carrier options.
We will be working with various experienced fulfillment centers. We are offering tax-friendly options for US, EU, Canada, Australia and Mexico.
The shipping rates below are an estimate but they will be the maximum possible value charged to the pledge manager at the end of the campaign. We have slightly overestimated some of the rates so as to give ourselves some leeway to work with unforeseen circumstances. 
Delivery is expected to be in October 2019.
Pledge Manager
We will be working togther with CrowdOx. For those who are new to Kickstarter, a pledge manager will help us to manage the orders and information more effectively. About a week after the campaign ends, all backers will receive an email with a survey to confirm shipping address, shipping costs and any additional add-ons or purchases that they'll like to make.
Retailers
Please email us at hello@lordofthechords.com. Thank you!
Our Estimated Timeline

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Lord of the Chords LLP was founded in 2018, by Jonathan, Jun Yu and Keith. All three of us engineering majors at university. We are proud to say that the three of us have taken a year's leave of absence to ensure that fulfilment goes smoothly. There's nothing more that we want than for Lord of the Chords to be in your hands, wow-ing your friends, making you laugh, and showing you that music theory can in fact be fun!

At Lord of the Chords, we strive to make products that are beautiful, hilarious, and enlightening, and we think we've done that with this game.

The money raised by this campaign will be used to fund the first round of production for Lord of the Chords. This includes injection molding for the box, manufacturing costs for the cards, rulebook and tokens, and shipping.

We have done our best to accurately gauge our costs by building relationships with our future manufacturers and suppliers. 

While printing, shipping, and processing delays are always a possibility, we have set a reasonable delivery date based on our experience.

Fun Guaranteed! 
We want you to love your experience with Lord of the Chords. If you don't enjoy the game after you've received and played it, just send it back to our headquarters and we'll issue you a full refund, no questions asked.

Refunds – Kickstarter 
If you'd like a refund before your item ships, you have until one week before the scheduled ship date to request one. We can offer you a 90% refund since Kickstarter retains about 10% of your pledge for various fees. If there is something wrong with your item, we appreciate the opportunity to replace or exchange it. If a refund is preferred and there is no defect with the product, you'll be responsible for shipping it back to us. Upon receipt of the returned item, we'll issue you a 90% refund. Refund requests must be made within 30 days of the date the item was delivered to you.

Replacements 
We are always happy to replace defective or damaged tokens, cards, or other components. Just send us photos of the damage, and we will ship a replacement at no additional cost to you. If your item needs to be returned, we will cover the cost of the return shipping. We provide replacement pieces while titles are active in our catalog, which is typically at least a year after their initial printing. Replacement requests must be made within 30 days of the date the item was delivered to you.

campaign.story:
Hey! We're No Pun Included, professional board game reviewers, and thanks to you we've been making board game reviews for five years. We need your help to make our sixth year a reality.  At NPI we put you first, working hard at helping you decide whether a board game is right for you and showcasing some of the best that board games have to offer.
But don't take us for our word - just watch one of our videos to see for yourself. 
We're incredibly proud of everything we've managed to achieve so far, but making informative, entertaining reviews takes a lot of time and effort. Whilst board games are constantly on the rise, it is still a niche hobby. Long ago we made the choice to be independent from board game publishers which means we rely on you to keep us going. Your kind contributions will help us produce:
More Board Game Reviews
Board Game Play-throughs (with our very first launching in just a few days!)
Side-projects such as the What Board Game is this Song About show
This year we've chosen not to offer board game promos as rewards because they feel impersonal. Instead, we wanted to create some truly special rewards that we hope you'll appreciate. 
 Newsletter: Backers at all levels that include rewards will be eligible to receive our excellent newsletter packed with sneak peaks at our upcoming reviews, board game musings and our general goings on.  
 Gloomhaven Adventure: Gloomhaven fans rejoice! Not only will backers at £15 and above receive a brand new digital Gloomhaven adventure designed by us and the game's creator Isaac Childres, but folks who missed out on last year's adventure will gain immediate access to it after they pledge to our Kickstarter at any level (you'll find it in the updates section). 
Elaine's Album of Comedy Board Game Songs: By far the most requested feature for our Kickstarter campaign is that we release an album with Elaine's wonderful songs about board games. So we're going to do just that. Expect a lovingly, not-at-all professionally produced, very digitally delivered set of songs that will be available exclusively only to backers of this campaign. 
If you want to hear some of Elaine's songs, you could do much worse than watching our panel show that we filmed at UKGE 2018. 
Behind the Scenes Vlogs: Ever wanted to know what it's like to film NPI videos? This year you can. Through the course of the next season we'll make four videos letting you take a peek at how we do what we do. You're helping us make this journey a reality so we want you to come along. 
 Your Name on Our Wall: Let's be frank - you're making us happen and we want to credit you. So you know those fast scrawls with people's names at the end of a video? Right, OK.  We're not doing that. We want something more personal and more meaningful. So we commissioned the wonderful Rachel and Heinze from Semi Co-Op to create a piece of art comprised entirely of your names (or whatever you choose to go by - within reason). It might be our logo or something else that represents us but we'll leave the specifics up to them. Then, we'll get a large print and hang it on our wall to be featured in all our reviews. Finally, we'll get lovely A5 prints mailed to you as a nice memento. 
 A Bad Joke: What if No Pun Included made a video just for you? I mean, really. Just for you. You'd be the only person to see this video and maybe there's a good reason for that. Maybe this video is not meant to be seen. And you'll be the guardian of its secret. Note: lack of quality and length guaranteed. 
 Play Games with Us: If you ever wanted to play a game with us whilst simultaneously putting a big donation into our campaign - this is your chance. There's two reward levels that let you do that. You can either play a game with us this year at UK Games Expo in Birmingham, UK in June (which naturally would require for you to already be at UK Games Expo) or, if you're feeling particularly generous, you can spend the entire day playing games at our house (although it would require for you to figure out travel and accommodation to United Kingdom). 
A Bag of Junk #2: Last, but definitely not least is the world renowned bag of junk, version 2.0. Yes, to you, our true fan, we will send a bag loaded with useless tat that just happened to have been used as props in our videos. Upon reception last year's proud owner described their prized possession as " why did I do this?" Words of praise indeed. And this year the bag is bigger and better. 
This year we only have three goals. If we reach our funding, NPI can continue as it was for another year. However, if we reach £35,000 - Elaine can take a step back from her full-time job to only work part time and spend more time on No Pun Included. This means more Elaine in videos, more songs, more zany skits - more everything that makes us good. Finally, if we can reach £50,000 - that's both of us working on No Pun Included full time - essentially the dream scenario. Let's make it happen!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We've run and delivered on two campaigns before and we're confident we can successfully deliver on this one. In fact, in our previous campaign we asked for funding for six months and with smart allocation of funds and our time we stretched it out to a whole year. Of course, our work entirely relies on just us two and it specifically relies on us being healthy and well. We take care to look after ourselves and make sure we're mentally and physically fit. We hope you feel confident in putting your trust in us and we're certain we won't let you down.

campaign.story:
This is BAM! This is a small interface that allows you to connect the best of microphones to your smartphone wirelessly.
BAM! is presented as a slice of a mixing console:
Adjustment of the gain in increments
VU-meter for visual level control and fader in the form of a knob.
Phantom power (+48V)
3.5mm jack connector to connect a headset to monitor what is being transmitted.
Range: 30m!
BAM! uses Bluetooth 3.0 technology to send the audio signal from your professional equipment. It connects directly to a microphone or to the output of a mixing console. Pair it with a smartphone and shoot with your favorite app!
BAM! runs on iOS or Android with the following applications and many more :

MoviePro, FiLMiC Pro, Mavis, Camera FV-5, LU-Smart (LiveU), MoJoPro (Aviwest), CT Pro, etc... The application must be able to use Bluetooth as an external audio source.
This small transmitter can also be used for live broadcasting. The delay between audio and video is imperceptible. It’s less than a frame!
Specifications
Input : XLR 3-pin female
Impedance : 1kOhm
Bluetooth : STD 3.0
Frequency range : 50Hz - 7kHz
Sampling frequency : 16kHz
Range : 30m
Autonomy : 4h (minimum)
Dimensions : 14.5cm x 3cm x 4.5cm
Project status
The development is basically finished. The design should not or only slightly evolve. The production of functional prototypes made it possible to validate the quality of the key components of this project. In addition, the production will be carried out in Switzerland at the service provider who made the prototypes.
Here is a small presentation of the different generations of prototypes already made.

campaign.story:
We're excited to relaunch Aftershock: San Francisco & Venice with the following changes:
We are launching with the Venice components included, which allow for more dynamic and interactive games at lower player counts
We are also including the previously optional District 6 expansion with every pledge
No deluxe components, which lowers weight, shipping & production costs
Updated name to help differentiate from other games with similar titles
The world has been hit with mega earthquakes. The worst destruction has devastated the San Francisco Bay area. It is a time of rebuilding to restore this area to its former glory.  
In Aftershock: San Francisco and Venice, players will spend money to acquire planning cards, which are used to increase population, build bridges, and determine where aftershocks occur. Spend money wisely to acquire aftershocks that will allow you to move people into and out of the demolished areas. Planning and careful negotiation are essential in order to maintain your population and score your best-planned cities and bridges. 
Aftershock: San Francisco and Venice is an area control and resource management game for 2-5 players that plays in 60 minutes. The player with the most points at the end of the game wins!
If you aren’t familiar with Aftershock: San Francisco and Venice, you can check out the BGG page for more details.
For more information, we encourage you to view our How-To-Play video directly below, or simply read our draft rulebook here.  
Play now on Tabletop Simulator thanks to Overboard Games!
Every pledge of the Aftershock: San Francisco and Venice pledge level will include everything here! 
Every pledge of the Aftershock: San Francisco and Venice pledge level will include the District 6 expansion - six player support and area tokens for increased replayability!
Aftershock: District 6 Overview:
District 6 brings all the swinging and swaying strategy of Aftershock: San Francisco and Venice to six players (an extra player screen, player board, 25 meeples, 16 bridges, 5 houses, player tokens, etc) and introduces 21 area tokens, a brand new board mechanic. 
Explanation of Area Tokens:
Area tokens are effects placed randomly on different city sections at the beginning of the game.  During play Area Tokens present challenges or rewards to the meeples placed within that region - creating a different game play for that region during this game. 
Area tokens create a totally new, unique play experience for each replay.
 AFTERSHOCK: (Pledge $45 or more) One copy of Aftershock: San Francisco and Venice and with all of the stretch goals and the sixth player expansion. Shipping pledge rates based on location. For additional copies in the US and international, check our rates below.  
We are excited to offer retailer packages for Brick and Mortar stores. For more information, please email us at: retailers@indieboardsandcards.com.
It is important that everyone knows that we are using a pledge manager. That means you’ll be able to manage your pledge amount for all the add-ons that you want after the project closes, along with during the campaign. We will post an update to notify backers when the pledge manager email is being sent out. At that time, you’ll need to manage your pledge and enter your shipping address and complete your order.
 Aftershock: San Francisco and Venice is the 47th project from the combined teams behind Stronghold Games, Indie Boards and Cards, & Action Phase Games. With the successful execution of our first 46 projects, we have become experienced publishers with a reputation for great games that are delivered in a timely fashion. 
 Aftershock: San Francisco and Venice  was designed by the talented Bobby West and Alan R. Moon, the designer of Ticket to Ride. This game has been tested in-house, ensuring that every part of the game is of the best possible quality. We are confident that this game will be in your collection for years to come. 
 District 6 expansion is included with every pledge, a $20 retail value which will be sold in stores.
All of the art assets are complete and ready for immediate upload after the project funds.   
Kickstarter is the world's largest funding platform for creative projects. Every month, tens of thousands of people pledge millions of dollars to creative projects in dozens of categories. 
A person who supports a project is called a "backer." The process of giving money to this project is called a "pledge." 
In return for your pledge, we (the creators of the campaign) are able to offer "rewards," depending on the amount you pledge. For example, if you pledge $45 to help back the project, we'll offer you a copy of the game along with any stretch goals we achieve as soon as it is manufactured. 
You can become a backer in just three easy steps: 
 Step 1: Read through the pledge levels and rewards we are offering in the right sidebar of this page.
 Step 2: Click the large, green "BACK THIS PROJECT" button to the right of the trailer video at the top of this page. 
 Step 3: Enter your pledge amount, and complete the steps for filling in your information. This process takes just a few seconds! That's it! It's really that simple! Thank you for backing! 
Once you've backed this project, we encourage you to share this page on social media platforms, such as Facebook and Twitter, and share with your friends and family. Also, be sure to like Stronghold Games on Facebook and follow us on Twitter for real-time updates about this project and more!  
Retailers: Please direct message us for more information. 
Every backer is important to us, regardless of location, but the reality is that shipping and sales taxes are very expensive and is a cost we all need to share. To offset this, while remaining fiscally responsible, we have included a discount on ALL shipping and taxes, but there is no free shipping. Shipping & Taxes charges will be added after Kickstarter ends, every backer will be responsible for paying these fees in the pledge manager after the campaign ends. Please see shipping & taxes chart below:   
For the US, Canada, UK and the EU we have included applicable taxes, your rewards will be sent Duty Free from within your region – there will not be any additional customs charge. Outside of the US, Canada, UK and the EU, we cannot guarantee customs friendly shipping in these areas. There may be additional duties and/or fees charged by your country's governmental agencies and/or shipping partners. Those fees are solely your responsibility, and we can neither cancel a pledge nor will we pay those fees. In case a package is returned or destroyed due to non-payment of such fees, your pledge will be considered fulfilled. 
Our plan is to have a limited number of Aftershock: San Francisco and Venice available at Essen with all the stretch goals from this project. We will not be taking reservations as in years past, everything will be first come, first served at Essen. If you would like to get the rewards from this project, we suggest you back through kickstarter! 
While our current production schedule looks like Kickstarter rewards will ship out well before Essen, it may be the case that we have games at Essen before the Kickstarter backer copies are sent. It may also be the case that we are unable to get games to Essen in time. I wish we were able to absolutely guarantee results, but we simply know that we can't make such commitments when so many other parties are involved in the process.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is the 47th Kickstarter project from the combined teams behind Stronghold Games, Indie Boards and Cards & Action Phase Games. We have learned how to streamline the game publishing process and have successfully delivered all of our previous Kickstarter projects to thousands of supporters. Our previous experiences will enable us to also deliver this project on time and we have every confidence that Aftershock: San Francisco and Venice will be on schedule and of the highest possible quality.

That said, there are always complexities and considerations in a project of this scope that may cause delays. Stronghold Games, Indie Boards and Cards & Action Phase Games will use contract manufacturing to make this game, freight forwarders to get games through customs, and 3rd parties like Amazon, the US Post Office, and FEDEX to ship the games to you – we don't control everything and there are lots of opportunities for delay. We have a track record of making everything work out for backers in the end – so please be confident and supportive of our efforts to get this great game into your hands.

REFUND POLICY 
We can refund you within 14 days of the campaign’s end, fees included. After that, we have a policy of no questions asked, though that’s minus 20% for Kickstarter and payment processing fees (which we can’t get back from them after 14 days). However, if we’ve begun packaging your pledge for shipment (usually 4 to 6 weeks before the actual shipping date), no refunds are possible. If a component cannot be delivered AT ALL, we refund that completely, including fees.

All refunds after the 14 days close of the campaign may be processed via PayPal or reversed via Stripe to your credit card at our discretion. Refunds within 14 days are reversed via Stripe to your credit card.

This project is being funded in USD and any refunds processed will be in USD for the exact amount received in USD, excluding any applicable fees depending on the time of the refund being processed.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS 
By pledging to this project, you acknowledge that the final look, materials, and content of the rewards (and the project) are subject to change and may differ substantially from what is presented while the Kickstarter project was active. 
If you do not log in and submit your project survey results (ie, provide us with your shipping address) for your pledge within 8 weeks of our notification, you agree that we have fulfilled our obligations to you in full for payment or donations received. However, we may, at our discretion, refund or ship your pledge (at additional cost for international backers) if you complete your project survey after the 8-week window has elapsed.

If you do not accept these terms, please do not pledge on this project but instead wait for the general release.

campaign.story:
Garphill Games, in association with our international partners are proud to bring you Paladins of the West Kingdom. This is the second title in the West Kingdom trilogy of games, following on from Architects of the West Kingdom.
*Tax-friendly shipping to Canada and Portugal is only for English editions, not French or Portuguese.
Paladins of the West Kingdom is set at a turbulent time of West Francia's story, circa 900 AD. Despite recent efforts to develop the city, outlying townships are still under threat from outsiders. Saracens scout the borders, while Vikings plunder wealth and livestock. Even the Byzantines from the east have shown their darker side. As noble men and women, players must gather workers from the city to defend against enemies, build fortifications and spread faith throughout the land. Fortunately you are not alone. In his great wisdom, the King has sent his finest knights to help aid in our efforts. So ready the horses and sharpen the swords. The Paladins are approaching.
Key Features:
Unique gameplay experience with interesting and tough decisions to make each round
12 unique Paladins and more than 60 Townsfolk and Outsider Cards provide a huge amount of depth and replayability
Multiple paths to victory, thanks to the Suspicion system, Attribute Tracks and wide array of potential Townsfolk and Outsider combinations
Just the right amount of player interaction, with no take-that mechanisms
Intuitive and easy to use solo play mode
Over 250 cards and 240 wooden tokens
Aim of the Game
The aim of Paladins of the West Kingdom is to be the player with the most victory points (VP) at game's end. Points are gained by building outposts and fortifications, commissioning monks and confronting outsiders. Each round, players will enlist the help of a specific Paladin and gather workers to carry out tasks. As the game progresses, players will slowly increase their faith, strength and influence. Not only will these affect their final score, but they will also determine the significance of their actions. The game is concluded at the end of the seventh round.

campaign.story:
NuDock is a smartphone docking station that charging your phone while simultaneously giving you everything you need for entertainment and work in one place, just as convenient as your laptop.
.
NuDock seamlessly transforms your smartphone into an entertainment and work center.The list of things you can connect to your smartphone is almost endless:
Flash drive
Hard drive
Projector
TV screen
Monitor
Mouse
Keyboard
Game controller
SD and MicroSD card
All of these connect to your smartphone through NuDock, while keeping your phone charged.
A powerful portable dock provides all the necessary ports you need in daily life: 3 x USB 3.0, 4K@30Hz HDMI, SD & MicroSD card slots, 3.5mm AUX and PD supported USB-C enabling a dynamic power transfer of 5V/9V/14.5V/20V@3A max with a maximum power delivery of 49W. 
Here is an youtube review video!
NuDock lets you push to slide the top lid of the box open and close with one hand in order to reveal the USB-C connector. Simply push to slide the top lid of the box open and close with one hand to reveal the USB-C connector. Then plug in your smartphone and the top lid acts as a phone stand which secures your phone at a perfect viewing angle. Connect anything else you need and see how easy it is to utilize all the functions of your phone. Keep its USB-C input connected to the adapter to provide power for all of your other ports as well as your smartphone. 
NuDock allows you to navigate your smartphone like you’re on a laptop, increasing your work efficiency. Editing files, emails, pictures can be annoying and inconvenient on the small screen of your smartphone, but with NuDock you can turn your smartphone into a mini-desktop computer. Connect a mouse, keyboard and a flash drive to USB 3.0 ports on the product, and you can edit documents and transfer files from a flash drive.
Easily give presentations or share slide shows stored on your smartphone with others on a projector or monitor. No need to bring your laptop! NuDock gives you the edge over others when on a business trip because now you can show a presentation in a conference room from your phone instead of lugging around your laptop.
Simply plug your phone into NuDock to seamlessly stream 4K 30Hz HDMI video to your UHD TV or music to an A/V receiver. You can control your phone from the comfort of your couch and NuDock charges your phone while in use so you don’t have to worry about draining the power of your smartphone while enjoying the big screen. It’s the perfect way to turn your home into a home theatre and enjoy ultra-high definition video and audio at home with your family!
Note: The final output resolution and image quality is limited by the capability of your smartphone, monitor/screen and HDMI cable. Please ensure your devices and cables support 4K resolution. 
Play mobile game like you’re on a PC! With NuDock you can connect to a bigger screen, use a mouse, type on a keyboard or even use a game controller to play Android games more easily. It enables better vision, easier targeting and more flexible control. And it keeps your phone charged the entire time as well!
The SD and MicroSD card readers in NuDock support cards up to 2 TB and speeds up to 104 MB/s. Simply plug in SD and microSD cards to copy, move and delete the files. With NuDock you can transfer tons of images in just a few minutes.

Three USB 3.0 ports allow ultra-high transfer speed at 5Gbps (640MBps)—over 10X faster than the traditional USB 2.0 ports. Transfer large files between your phone and flash drive in just seconds. For example, you can transfer a 1GB movie in just 3 seconds!
NuDock works best with a variety of USB-C PD (Power Delivery) wall chargers rated from 5V/9V/14.5V/20V@3A max. This gives you 49W of maximum power to power all of the ports and still charge your phone fast!
Note: A PD wall charger is not included. Please use your original mobile charger with NuDock to get the best charging performance.
NuDock is seamlessly compatible with lots of smartphones across different platforms. Ditch your laptop and turn your smartphone into a desktop.

updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
We promised to update you on every advance towards Emergy Disk delivery, however small it is, and here is the GOOD NEWS: tooling for the Emergy plastic body had been started!
We’ve chosen highly reputable and capable factory to manufacture plastic body of intricate shape using an injection molding which is quite complicated technological process requiring skilled and experienced personnel and powerful specialized equipment. About 10 days ago, we’ve submitted the work order, sent the deposit for making a die (“die”, also called “mold”, is a tool for injection molding), and the order was placed in the factory’s queue. Yesterday we’ve got the factory confirmation that tooling has begun. The mold will be ready in just 5 to 6 weeks, which is surprisingly fast. In our experience with injection molding in the US, making a multi-piece mold usually takes 2 to 3 months, and that was before the pandemic.

Dear Backers,
We understand your frustration with too lengthy delay of EMERGY production and delivery. We deeply apologize for the delay which is mainly caused by circumstances beyond our control. We also apologize for long intervals between the updates: there were no real news to share and we did not like repeating again and again that actual timelines remain uncertain. From now on, we’ll update you regularly and provide special updates for every significant event.

Dear Backers,
Finally, we happy to announce a positive news. Our manufacturer partner resumed their operations. And it’s not just that.
We are very excited to let you know that the first sample unit of the EMERGY DISK for mass production had been manufactured and mailed to us this morning. We’ll use this unit for inspection and preliminary tests; the final acceptance tests will be executed at the factory abroad as soon as US travel regulations allow us to go there.

Dear Backers,
As you know from our updates, EMERGY DISK will be mass-manufactured in China and since China is harshly hit by coronavirus most factories greatly cut or cease production. With that in mind, we can’t do more than we can do.
We sincerely apologize for a long delay with the delivery,  but please understand that your pledges go into development, tests and mass-production of a completely new product. A route from an operational prototype shown on Kickstarter project page to efficient reliably working high quality product may happen to be much longer than a creator planned for. It isn’t a scam or a con, it’s just a way most R&D projects go. As the Murphy’s law says, "Anything that can go wrong will go wrong, and usually at the worst time.”

campaign.story:
GLOW is the comfortable high-quality sneaker with unseen versatility, perfect for every moment of your life: from toned down casual days to the wildest all-night-long parties. It comes with 6 colors in 1 unique sneaker, so you can switch between the rich LED colors that fully light up your feet.    
For the rebels and trendsetters, we created a true head-turner that doesn’t compromise comfort for style. GLOW combines unique LED footwear that looks ridiculously cool with wearable, comfortable, well-made sneakers.
We created everything you wished for but never expected from LED shoes. You need sneakers that go with everything. Like, really. GLOW are so versatile that with only 1 pair, you get 6 colorful looks with vibrant LED colors. Plus the classic minimalist unlit style.
THE PROBLEM
In today's fast paced life, buying a pair of sneakers for every one of your outfits can cost you a small fortune. Plus all the environmental waste we cause because we go through so many pairs every year.
THE SOLUTION
With Glow, the 7 styles in 1 sneaker saves you the headache, cost and wardrobe space of buying multiple pairs of sneakers for all your different outfits! GLOW is also cruelty free, vegan, and sustainably produced.
To flawlessly combine functionality and style, we have partnered up with the top leading developers in LED technology. This patent-protected material allowed us to find a perfect balance that ensures your feet feel fresh and comfortable all the time.
The top part of the shoe is made of three main layers. First, a super comfortable liner that protects the most sensitive feet and then a forming cloth that gives your sneakers structure and keeps them looking great. It’s all wrapped up in a high-tech optical fabric that looks like a million bucks, night and day.
We made sure your sneakers are easy to clean. You only have one job: keep the switch away from water. Other than that, you can soak and brush them lightly to keep yours looking great. 
Full disclosure: you can’t swim while wearing GLOW. But then again, no one would see how lit (pun intended) they are underwater, so there’s no point really. But they’re so well built, that your LED sneakers are weather resistant and you'll be worry-free if you’re caught out in the rain. The switch and charging port are securely covered so you know you’re always safe. 
GLOW look and feel comfortable… because they actually are! Imagine stepping on a white, fluffy, ridiculously comfortable cloud. That’s how wearing these sneakers feels like. The high tech memory foam insoles hug your feet and keep them cozy for as long as you need, so you can focus on enjoying life.
At only 10 oz (300 grams), your GLOW are as lightweight as regular everyday sneakers, yet they include all the LED tech! Take them anywhere you want to make an impression at - from the next festival you’re attending, to the championship final your team is playing in.
GLOW are versatile sneakers that adapt to your active lifestyle. If you're on the move all day or occasionally do some parkour, you'll be surprised to see how great of a friend your new sneakers are.
Running, cycling or even just walking at night can sometimes feel so dangerous, you might stop going out. At GLOW, we believe that you should be free to explore the world. Simply put on your GLOWs and you won’t even have to hear the honking cars - everyone will see you in the darkest of nights and you’ll feel safer than ever.
With GLOW, your creativity can be effortlessly expressed with a touch of a button. We celebrate being unique, escaping the ordinary and we definitely like to light up the world (but we usually start with a party).
For the parties that seem to and do last forever, the nights you get lost in your thoughts while running and the special moments you just can’t stop having fun. GLOW makes the party in your feet last up to 14 hours. Fully recharged in only 2 hours, you’ll be ready for an encore in no time!
At GLOW, we have a commitment towards sustainability. Our sneakers are made with high quality vegan leather and we are proud to announce that we are 100% cruelty free. We feel it's our responsibility to do our part to light up our world.
From day to night, you can wear your GLOWs anywhere. Turn them on and change the colors on the go to transform your outfit from work to after-hours fun. Dare to be different and all your friends will love to gather around you. You’ll be the superstar who brings people together.
As a parent, you would do anything for your kids. We love to see them smile, hear their delighted squeals of joy and feel their excitement - so GLOW comes in kids sizes. Now you’ll have another thing that connects you and get to enjoy your precious time together even more.

Are you unsure of how to pre-order on Kickstarter? Have no fear, we're here to help. 
How To Add To Your Pledge
It's really simple! First select your reward and your country for the shipping destination. Then add up the Pledge amount displayed (includes shipping cost, if applicable) with the price of the add-on you want. Replace the pledge amount with the total cost you just added up. Click Pledge and you're done!
Let's give you an example. Robert from the US wants to add:
2 Glow Bags + Glow Sneakers (Super Early Bird reward)
He selects the reward, the country and adds up. 
CA$119 + 2x CA$55 = CA$229. 
He types in 229 in the Pledge amount field and clicks "Pledge".
When do I tell you my size? Your size info will be collected through a survey after the campaign ends. But you need to measure your feet before then, to make sure you can get GLOW in your size.
Our community is at the heart of everything we do. We’re building an awesome community where heroes like you, who like to stand out and be unique can connect. You’ll always have a say in our brand’s future. 

We’re a bunch of sneakers-loving freaks that got hung up on a pair of LED shoes that didn’t exist. So we created it ourselves, after a year of trial, error, meetings, samples and countless prototypes. But we never gave up on our dream and we won’t give up on yours. We’re here to bring some real light in your life, in the form of high quality LED shoes!
We're the dream-and-do team: we dream of creating solutions that help heroes like you shine and we do our best to achieve that!

We have spent the better part of the past year working on and refining the Yes We Glow shoes. Just how sneaker-loving freaks like to spend their time! We know them inside out and we have teamed up with a respected manufacturing partner that uses patented materials and has years of experience in the field.

We have set a realistic timeline so we can bring light(ness) to your feet as soon as possible, but also took into account the time needed to manufacture high quality shoes. That’s something we are passionate about.

Sometimes, unforeseen stuff may happen. Sometimes, lights go out, that kind of stuff. While we can’t possibly account for situations like these, we are committed to keeping you updated every step of the way. With YesWeGlow, you’ll always be in the know. We’re in this together!

MetaFly is the result of more than 50 years of flight research and development. Starting in the 1960s, when my grandfather and father created the first mechanical flying bird, the TIM.
Since a young age, I’ve proudly continued that tradition by training to be an expert aeronautical engineer and dedicating my life to learning, inventing and teaching everything about biomimetic aeronautic engineering. In 2014 I successfully crowdfunded Bionic Bird and delivered them to backers just 3 weeks later. It’s my pleasure to now continue sharing that passion with the world, with my most advanced project yet- the delightfully biomimetic MetaFly.

Risks and challenges
While there are always risks & challenges with creating and delivering a brand new product, we've minimized them by having the entire process, from production to delivery, already set and arranged.

We have already signed agreements with key suppliers and manufacturers, and our prototype has been finalized. We have the required technical expertise when it comes to biomimetic and aeronautic engineering. We've been in this business since the 1960s, and we've even got experience with crowdfunding campaigns, as MetaFly is our second. 

All of this, along with our strategic partnerships with experienced crowdfunding and fulfillment experts, leaves little room for error and ensures a very quick delivery.

MetaFly - Late deliveries + Broken back bone and gluing rudder issues addressing.
updates.update_content:
We wish you a happy new year 2020!
Now most of the backers have received their rewards. For those who still have a delivery issue, we are studying each case and come back with answers as fast as possible after you contact us either by KS message or by sending an email to contact@bionicbird.com. 
We have one main global issue with Macao and Hong Kong deliveries at this time. We found out that the China mainland customs have forbidden any flying RC products to be shipped to those countries and most our parcels are hold by them. We have been working on finding solutions and may have one at the time I speak. We will send you an individual email to explain the case.

updates.update_userinfo: Unboxing MetaFly and useful tips by video
updates.update_content:
Hello backers,
More and more are receiving their little flying creature those days, and we want to help you to have a nice unboxing and first experience with it. Although the manual included is full of information, nothing is better than a video to explain some details.
So we decided to shoot a set of videos showing each step from the unboxing, assembly, and first use of your MetaFly. We highly recommend you to watch carefully all of them before to open your box (or after if it's already done...). You will probably find there the answer to most of your questions. The links for these videos are below.

updates.update_userinfo: VERY IMPORTANT TIPS to read before to use MetaFly - VIDEO VERSION
updates.update_content:
Hello Backers,
You will now soon receive your MetaFly!
I have prepared 2 videos to show how to put the wings on / remove the wings safely, and how to adjust its tail before the first flight attempt.
It is very important to have a look at these videos before you try to assembly or operate MetaFly for the first time, as it may prevent some damage. As you know, MetaFly is a miniaturized robot intended to fly. It is robust when in the air, because it has been designed to bear its own weight impacting on obstacles.
